FuncDef:
The system recording-scheme command configures a scheme in which system events are recorded.
The undo system recording-scheme command cancels the configuration.
By default, no system events are recorded.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a recording scheme.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.  The value should not contain slash (\), anti-slash (/), colon (:), asterisk (*), question mask (?), quotation mask ("), or angle brackets (< >).

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
At present, only events caused by the reboot command can be recorded.
Prerequisites
The recording-scheme command has been run to configure a recording scheme.
